natural solution: First, we combine like terms in the expression: \begin{align} (15x^3+80x-5)&-(-4x^3+4x-5)\\ &=15x^3+80x-5+4x^3-4x+5\\ &=19x^3+76x.\end{align}We can factor out a $19x$ from the expression, to get $$19x^3+76x=\boxed{19x(x^2+4)}.$$
